Html:
i'm developing a simple floor plan object placer, in vb.net, and thought about it

1. converting the floor plan image file to tiles, stored on local disk

2. show local tiles using gmap.net control on windows forms, and placing markers

 

is it possible to achive using this control ?

I have the same problem :

my solution is :

 - tiling : I use Global Mapper, I load my map in global mapper and I exported as web format (google map). global mapper will create directory with tiles images. tiles is like  c:\mytiles\zoom\lat\lng.png. now you can load tile to Gmap database.

azar
